name: Void Rising
description:
If game mouse stop working reload the page (You can select the level you where on in the level select screen)

Void Rising is a retro inspired and difficult 3D platformer. You have a bar that goes down and if your bar is empty the void rises. To avoid being swallowed by the empty nothingness of space you need to race to the portal and collect coins along the way to refill your bar.

Controls:

  • Jump: Space
  • Movement: WASD
  • Back: Esc(twice)
